oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ||kabbo (Jantje) (II)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: About the Daybreak (Day's Heart or Dawn's Heart) Star which has a heart (that is red and 'flesh'). The Daybreak Star has a Daybreak Star Heart child when it is an old Daybreak Star Heart. Besides a short statement of the nature of the Dawns-Heart, and of his child (L II.-2. 292 and 293), we have two long pieces. 1) See also Day's Heart and More about the Day's Heart Star: what he says to his daughter and The Day's Heart Star, 2) This story is found in Book II-2.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: About the Daybreak Star
